amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the Inspector General to investigate the FAA's decision to broaden the acceptable EKG range for pilots to fly.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require the Inspector General to investigate the FAA's decision to broaden the acceptable EKG range for pilots to fly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 258 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Miller (IL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 258 (Roll no. 345).
